title.rendered: ICC launches official ODI World Cup 2023 film featuring Shah Rukh Khan

content.rendered:
The International Cricket Council (ICC) released the official ODI World Cup 2023 film, titled ‘It Takes One Day,’ starring Shah Rukh Khan, on Thursday.

Read More: Igor Stimac appeals PM Modi to allow Indian football team to participate in Asian Games

The film depicts famous World Cup experiences and relates them to the specifically designed Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 ‘Navarasa,’ which represents the nine emotions fans most typically experience during a cricket match, according to the ICC.
